text: <sep> yeah sure , i'm easy <sep> salary is important <sep> hello <sep> position is most important <sep> where do you like to work ? <sep> weekly holiday very important <sep> workplace not as much <sep> google , amazon , apple or facebook <end>

<sep> hello ! i've got a great job available for you as a designer . any interest ? <sep> i am interested , but i would like to know the salary . <sep> it pays almost $48 , 000 annually . <sep> comes with two days off each week ! lol <sep> i'm worth more than that . i need it to pay $60 , 000 . 00 . <sep> i can get you up over $58k to start , and then we can take a look in six months . would that work ? <sep> the salary is fine . i also want three weeks paid vacation . <sep> i can't do that , but what i can do is keep your earnings the same and throw in a third day off each week . <sep> that's another 52 days off , instead of just 15 (three weeks) . . just saying . . . . <sep> can i have at least one week's vacation on top of the extra day off per week . i like to take my child to disney once per year . <sep> i can work on the two fridays before my vacation and the two fridays after to almost even it out . <sep> i can't do that from here , but i'm sure you could work with your manager to turn some of those extra days off into a few consecutive days . <sep> really , i'm kinda tapped out on my end . i hope you accept this great job offer ! <sep> here it is again if you wanna take another look . . . <end>
<sep> hi <sep> sydney would be great <sep> what about an engineer job with google ? <sep> what location <sep> sydney <end>

<sep> hi there <sep> hi <sep> we plan to start you at 19 , does that sound good ? <sep> i am looking for a job that pays 50 an hour / manager at amazon in sydney <sep> not at all <sep> sorry , i misread that . what makes your eperience and position worth 50 ? <sep> because i have the years of experience in a management position <sep> i also think you need 2 days for weekly holday . 4 seems like too much <sep> this is what i feel that i am worth <sep> we have lots of qualified candidates . also we will be putting you with google instead <end>

<sep> how would you feel about becoming a designer ? <sep> it sounds interesting . <sep> it allows for 2 days off a week . <sep> and a starting rate of 30/hr . <sep> is it a consistent schedule ? what is a normal schedule for this position ? \ <sep> what company is the position with ? <sep> . . . . although it is located in tokyo , it it consistant with any other normal work week . 5 days on 2 off . <sep> and it is with a great company . . . . apple . <sep> when would the position start ? <sep> are they willing to pay for moving expenses ? <sep> it will start as soon as you are ready to begin , and accept the offer . and i'm sure they would be willing to work with you on the expenses of moving so far away . <sep> i am very interested but am looking to start around $38 . 00/hour . <sep> i think it could be negotiated to start at $35 an hour if it would help you make a decision . <end>

<sep> hello there ! <sep> welcome ! <sep> hi <sep> hello <sep> today , we're looking to hire people at apple ! <sep> are you interested ? <sep> i am not interested in apple <sep> we need managers , deisgners , and salespeople ! <sep> how about facebook ? <sep> yes <sep> there is a designer position open at facebook <sep> sure <sep> ok , the position is open in seoul and sydney <sep> which one would you like ? <sep> sydney <sep> excellent , we can make that work <sep> here is an initial offer , does this work for you ? <sep> that should be a pretty even offer <sep> i think <sep> i can raise the salary a little , but keep the days at 3 <sep> 36$ / 3 days ? <sep> how about 38 <sep> let's do 37 :) for even ! <sep> lol <sep> alright you win <sep> will that work ? <sep> have a good day , sir/ma'am :) <end>

<sep> hello <sep> hello . i am looking to hire a new employee . <sep> great , i am looking for a new job as well <sep> do you have any previous experience ? we do have some engineer positions open . <sep> also for manager and designer . <sep> what positions are available ? <sep> there is an amazon manager position open . also for designer there . also engineer at facebook . <sep> i have sales experience for 6 years <sep> i'd prefer to work at facebook or apple <sep> i see . how about i send you an offer and we can talk about it ? <sep> sure , but i must admit that i can't work at tokyo . <sep> i have no interest in japan . <sep> i see . if that is the case , i may only have limited positions open . <sep> or seoul either . china or australia is fine <sep> you can propose and let's take it from there <sep> ok . i'll see what i can find . <sep> thanks <sep> ok . i found one position left as a manager . your sales experience will probably come in handy . <sep> please let me know your salary and holiday requirements and i can fine tune this offer . <sep> that's an insult to my profile . i asked for sales , you declined that . i said apple or facebook , you gave amazon . i did not want seoul , and you gave me that <sep> well , here is what i can propose to you <sep> ok , i am ready to hear an offer . <sep> unfortunately that cannot work . <sep> this is how i felt after i saw your proposal . <sep> i'll try to be fair with future offers . <sep> let's see <sep> the main problem is the vast majority of reasonable positions are in japan . <sep> so i'm very limited with other countries as far as reasonable salary and holiday are concerned . <sep> and sales jobs are almost non existent for the companies you mentioned . <sep> well it is a negotiation , a two way discussion . as far as i can see on the jobs portal - i see there are various sales positions in sydney and beijing <sep> yes , they are there . but the packages are a losing proposal . i'll try to send one more offer here . <sep> you are surely joking , right ? <sep> 2 days - the bare minimum <sep> and a pay of 22 <sep> yes , that is due to the location . <sep> workers in that country are paid low . <sep> so if you want a sales position paying $50 , i cannot reasonably accept that . <sep> but if you are willing to relocate to japan , i can pay you much higher salary and more holiday . <sep> well , i offered that proposal in response to your outrageously annoying offer <sep> we can work around with the salary for sales position if you'd like <sep> you can submit a further offer and we can hopefully work something out . <sep> i would like to be fair . <sep> fair enough <sep> if you are willing to take 3 weekly holidays instead of four , i'll agree to it . <sep> provided the salary remains the same . <sep> i am just asking such a low pay of 22$ so that i can avail 4 days week <sep> the location and position can also be the same that you prefer . <sep> if you want to work at facebook in sydney for sales , 3 holidays is the most i can give you starting out . <sep> everything else can work . <sep> in that case , i would demand a higher salary of minimum 56$ <sep> i could not offer that given your location - 22 is on the high side of the scale . <sep> you can decide now . all my expertise and experience will come in handy and i can relocate later down the lane , <sep> it's due to the preferred location . if you were willing to accept japan , we could probably agree . <sep> but i understand toyko is out for you . <sep> i am sorry too , it looks like we both are ending up wasting our time rather than settling for a win-win <sep> do you have a final offer ? i'll be willing to consider it . <end>
